definitions.definition: a partner in a sexual relationship outside marriage

examples.text: He denied that he was her lover.
We were lovers for several years.
The park was full of young lovers holding hands.
They met at work and soon became lovers.
He suspected me of having a lover.
The song is about a jilted lover who seeks revenge.
She decided she would take a lover.

definitions.definition: a person who likes or enjoys a particular thing

examples.text: He was a devoted animal lover, and had a large number of pets at home.
She was a great lover of the arts, and of Greek architecture in particular.
